author: stsp
msg: Fix a possible crash in ra_svn if SASL authentication is active.
lifetime to survive until connection pool cleanup. CyrusSASL
needs the callbacks in the cleanup handler of this pool.

author: lindner
msg: SHINDIG-1616 | Patch from Igor Belakovskiy | Expose oauth data in the metadata sent to the container

author: jfclere
msg: AJP_EBAD_METHOD is also a bad request so return HTTP_BAD_REQUEST
